short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy switching search language on google.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension adds a language switcher to the Google search results page. When the switch is off, your default language settings in Google are applied. When the switch is on, it forces Google search to use your configured language and country preferences.
